title: Markdown Parser
description: Parse a comprehensive subset of Markdown including headers, paragraphs, code blocks, lists, blockquotes, links, images, and inline formatting.

motivation.why: Markdown is the most widely used lightweight markup language for documentation, blogging, and content management. A robust parser enables custom documentation tooling.

inputFormat.description: Markdown with ATX headers (# to ######), code blocks (```), blockquotes (>), unordered lists (- or *), ordered lists (1.), horizontal rules (---), links [text](url), images ![alt](url), and inline formatting.

outputFormat.description: The parser returns a MarkdownDocument containing MdBlock enum values for each block element.

MdBlock.description: Enum: Heading{level, text}, Paragraph{text}, CodeBlock{language, code}, Blockquote{text}, List{ordered, items}, HorizontalRule, Blank
